sentence.Network_en: Leopold I of Babenberg became margrave of Austria in 976.
sentence.Network_cn: 公元976年巴奔堡的利奥波德一世成为奥地利侯爵.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent., from Middle Dutch markgrave 'count of a border territory', from marke 'boundary' + grave 'count' (used as a title)

means.word_mean: 1. the military governor of a frontier province in medieval Germany
2. a German nobleman ranking above a count (corresponding in rank to a British marquess)

auth_sentence.content: The school happened to be owned by one of Philip's older brothers-in-law, Berthold, Margrave of Baden.
